>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"chat_id","schema":{"type":"integer"},"description":"A unique integer value identifying this 채팅.","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"isConnected":{"type":"boolean","title":"현재 로그인한 유저의 채팅방 입장여부 (true: 입장, false: 퇴장)"}},"required":["isConnected"],"title":"ChatConnectRequest"}},"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"isConnected":{"type":"boolean","title":"현재 로그인한 유저의 채팅방 입장여부 (true: 입장, false: 퇴장)"}},"required":["isConnected"],"title":"ChatConnectRequest"}},"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"isConnected":{"type":"boolean","title":"현재 로그인한 유저의 채팅방 입장여부 (true: 입장, false: 퇴장)"}},"required":["isConnected"],"title":"ChatConnectRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
